FNumber, FName, FType, FState, FUse, FCreatePersonID, FCreateTime, SopSchemeTemplate_ID
mapper.update:
update
set FNumber = #{FNumber}, FName = #{FName}, FType = #{FType}, FState = #{FState}, FUse = #{FUse}, FCreatePersonID = #{FCreatePersonID}, FCreateTime = #{FCreateTime}, SopSchemeTemplate_ID = SopSchemeTemplate_ID where SopSchemeTemplate_ID = #{SopSchemeTemplate_ID}
mapper.select: select ,f1.NAME FStaffName,f2.NAME FTypeName from f left join OA_STAFF f1 on f.FCreatePersonID=f1.STAFF_ID left join SYS_DICTIONARIES f2 on f.FType=f2.DICTIONARIES_ID where f.SopSchemeTemplate_ID = #{SopSchemeTemplate_ID}

select isnull(count(*),0) RepeatNum from f where 1=1 and FNumber=#{FNumber}
and f.SopSchemeTemplate_ID !=#{SopSchemeTemplate_ID}
